channel.title: My XP rates are fixed, but it wont go past 99. plz help! read for info
channel.description: :confused: okay, my exp rates i have changed to were 14m xp is not required to get 99. But when i go past the new 99 xp amount, id like for it to show instead of 99, 100, 101,102 and so on. Anyone no how to do this
